name: i heart you PDF pattern
description:
this quilt was created with love in mind. whether you make it for a baby or the larger version (not pictured) for someone you love or a couple in love (young or old!) this will be the perfect quilt to show that love is a strong and a powerful thing, and very much appreciated and needed. :)
oh and the quilt is cute too. :)

the baby quilt measures 54" by 54" finished
fabric requirements:
Heart: 1 5/8 yards 
Background: 2 1/4 yards 
Binding: 1/2yard 
Backing: 3 1/2 yards
large throw quilt measures 108" by 108" (perfect for a couple to snuggle under!)
fabric requirements:
Heart: 4 3/4 yards 
Background: 6 1/4 yards 
Binding: 7/8yard 
Backing: 9 yards

name: Barn Dance Quilt Pattern- PDF FILE
description:
two quilt sizes are included in this pattern
baby quilt size: 42" x 42"
throw quilt size: 69" x 75"
inspired by the quilt blocks found on the side of barns in eastern iowa. this unique quilt also tells the story of the dances that go on inside. at first just a few people or pieces fall into place and slowly the rest of the individuals come together to create the "dance" or the quilt blocks.

fabric requirement baby:
4 Prints: 1 Fat Quarter of each (18" x 22")
Background: 12/3 yards 
Binding: 1⁄2 yard 
Backing: 3 yards

fabric requirement throw:
Prints:
Top purple star: Fat Quarter* (10801 15)
Top green diamonds: Fat Quarter (10806 18) Teal blue: 1⁄2 yard (10806 19)
￼￼Yellow: Fat Quarter
Orange: Fat Quarter
Pink: 1/3 yard
Gray: 1/3 yard
Bottom teal & green star: Fat Quarter
(10801 21)
Background: 51⁄4 yards (9900 97 Bella Solid) Binding: 2/3 yard (10803 18)
Backing: 5 yards (10804 16)
*Fat Quarter: 18" x 22"

name: Go anywhere Bag PDF FILE
description:
11 1/2" x 13" finished bag size
this bag is a great carry all bag and the reason i call it the "go anywhere bag" is because it can carry all you need and leaves your hands free to do anything else you need them to be doing. 
the patterns include the template for the applique flowers, and instructions to create this fabulous simple bag from start to finish. the inside liner has instructions for an inside pocket as well.

fabric requirements:
Bag Front: 3⁄4 yard (Linen)
Bag Lining: 1⁄2 yard (Simply Color: green vintage leaves #10801 18) Flowers: 1⁄2 yard (Simply Color: teal aqua ombré #10800 19) 
Fusible Webbing: 1⁄2 yard (Pellon 807)

**this is a downloadable pattern that is instantly sent to the email address attached to your paypal acct upon purchase. please check your email address before you place your order to make sure it is up to date and that there are no mistakes. that way you will receive your pattern quickly and without any problems.

name: the Chelsea Bag PDF pattern
description:
this is a download PDF pattern that includes exactly what the paper pattern includes: step by step instructions and illustrations with diagrams.

this bag is a great bag to carry your daily needs and even carry binders if needed. 
features one large TEXTURED outside pocket, and a three large pockets inside. this bag snaps closed. its by far one of my favorite bags i've created.

finished dimensions are:
19½" x 4" x 12½" finished.

supplies:
Bag Outside: 5/8 yard (10806-15)
Bag Lining: 5/8 yard (10801-15)
Outside textured pocket: 11/8 yard (10801-25)
Fusible light weight lining 20” x 29”
Pellon 931TD (for Handles)
Pellon TP971F (for Bag inside lining)
2 Snaps

description:
this tote is the carry all tote, it's large enough to carry your towel and sunscreen to the beach, pool, or lake, it's large enough to carry all your fresh produce from your farmer's market, or heck just keep all the stuff you need in one handy bag. 
best part this baby is reversible, and the bow doubles up as a light scarf just in case your activities run into the early evening!

name: Make it Sew Modern by Vanessa Christenson
description:
signed copy by the author.
About the Book
Now you can add new dimension and texture to your life, even if you’re just learning to sew. This exciting collection of sewing ideas from Vanessa Christenson, owner of V and Co., shows how. Vanessa presents current, fresh home decor and fashion patterns that demonstrate her great design sense.

    * Discover more than 20 simple sewing ideas, including eye-catching quilts, pillows, scarves, purses, and an assortment of clever embellishments
    * Create three-dimensional flowers, raw-edge ruffles, tasteful tucks and pleats, and more
    * Sew easy patterns and express yourself with unique designs that are just your style

**at this time i am only shipping in the united states. i am truly sorry! shipping is a booger!
